definitions.text: a chronic inflammatory collagen disease affecting connective tissue (skin or joints)
(comparative of `little' usually used with mass nouns) a quantifier meaning not as great in amount or degree
examples: less time to spend with the family

definitions.text: (nonstandard in some uses but often idiomatic with measure phrases) fewer
used to form the comparative of some adjectives and adverbs

examples: she walks less than she should
